The Thai: language caption of the post translating to English as: "This is where the [winning] lottery number came from. The previous winning numbers were found on the Prime Minister’s car, and this time it’s on a submarine. The draw is clearly a scam."
The announcement of the winning numbers: s National Lottery on September 1, 2020, as 999997.
